data.message: Hi FB how come there's no emojis to put in posts and comments, but only for the chat? From tablets and phones it's possible to put emojis but not from the computer. Then I found this site with emojis but FB deletes them when I put the emojis in the post. Then please make it possible for us to post emojis. Thank you.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Joanna. If there's something you'd like to see on Facebook,  please let us know here: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Ali
